physics
Class Vector2D

java.lang.Object
  physics.Vector2D

public class Vector2D
extends java.lang.Object

Class Vector2D defines a Vector which will be used in all Physics simulations in the Fluxware Game Engine. The Vector2D has both a Direction and Magnitude.

The units are as follows:

  • Magnitude is defined in Meters per second
  • Direction is defined in Radians

Author:
atrus
